Read a collection of indices of points from file.

Dimension and number of points should have been assigned a value before reaching this function.

int  N,

Read a collection of points from file.

Dimension and number of points should have been assigned a value before reaching this function. Points lie in an Euclidean division space.

Parameters
v- vector of points
N- number of points
D- dimension of points
filename- input file

template<typename T >
void readDivisionSpace ( Division_Euclidean_space< T > &  ds,
char *  filename

Read an Euclidean division space from file.

First line of file should have 'dimension number_of_points'.

Parameters
ds- Euclidean division space
filename- input file

template<typename T >
void readDivisionSpacefvecs ( Division_Euclidean_space< T > &  ds,
int &  N,
int &  D,
char *  filename 
)

Read an Euclidean division space from a "fvecs" file. Every line of the file has this format: D x_1 ... x_D.

Dimension and number of points are computed by the function.

Parameters
ds- Euclidean division space
N- number of points
D- dimension of points
filename- input file
